name: iD.apps
description: ID.apps develops applications dedicated to Smartphones, Tablets and TV connected in a cross-platform environment. The multiplication of products and related software platforms creates new needs for mobile application solutions. They respond with an innovative, comprehensive and structured offer based on proven know-how and offer a multi-platform offer (iOS / Apple, Android / Google, OS6 / BlackBerry, Bada / Samsung) for B2B2C applications and business applications for internal use.

locations.address: 12i rue du Patis Tatelin Immeuble Osiris
